title: Other and unspecified symptoms and signs involving general sensations and perceptions
chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
block: Symptoms and signs involving cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour
category: Other symptoms and signs involving general sensations and perceptions
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
